tool_description: Creates identical copies of directory structures with options for selective cloning, permission preservation, and metadata replication.

source_directory.description: Source directory path to clone from

destination_directory.description: Destination directory path where the clone will be created

preserve_permissions.description: Whether to preserve original permissions in the clone

preserve_metadata.description: Whether to preserve original metadata in the clone

exclude_patterns.description: Glob patterns for directories to exclude from cloning

overwrite_existing.description: Whether to overwrite existing directories at destination

error_messages: Source directory not found: The specified source_directory does not exist.
Destination path invalid: The destination_directory path is invalid or inaccessible.
Permission denied: Insufficient permissions to clone directory structure.
Destination already exists: Directory exists at destination and overwrite_existing is false.
Invalid clone depth: clone_depth must be between 1 and 10.
Exclude pattern error: One or more exclude patterns are malformed.
usage: Provide source_directory and destination_directory paths, optionally configure preservation settings, clone_depth, exclude_patterns, and overwrite behavior.

skipped_directories.description: List of directories skipped due to exclusion patterns or errors

clone_count.description: Total number of directories successfully cloned

clone_status.description: Overall status of the cloning operation
